metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Ping/Copy Command Combination
metadata.comment: Detects uncommon and potentially suspicious one-liner command containing both "ping" and "copy" at the same time, which is usually used by malware.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ping')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -n ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /n ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –n ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —n ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―n '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -y ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /y ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –y ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —y ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―y '))))

output.summary: Detects uncommon and potentially suspicious one-liner command containing both "ping" and "copy" at the same time, which is usually used by malware.

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
